traceability.evidence: • bin/dry-aged-deps.js: help text still shows “--config-file= … (coming soon)” and no code reading .dry-aged-deps.json • No code in src/ or bin/ that imports or parses a configuration file • README.md note “configuration-file support (.dry-aged-deps.json) are coming soon and not yet implemented” remains unchanged • No .dry-aged-deps.json example file in repo • No tests referencing config file parsing, merging, precedence, validation, or error handling
traceability.notes: The specification for config file support exists, but there is no implementation: the CLI does not read or merge config values, there are no tests, documentation is not updated beyond ‘coming soon’, and help text still marks it as unimplemented.
